website_summaries.verdict: Made from food-safe ABS plastic, this prehistoric taco holder is a great way to get kids to eat tacos, sandwiches, and other foods.
pros: Holds two tacos or other foods like sandwiches
Also comes in TACOsaurus and NACHOsaurus shapes
cons: Not for use in the microwave
Only fits standard-size shells, not larger ones or stand-and-stuff shells

customer_reviews.title: Tricerataco= Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife said she wanted this thing. Being a grown man I stood my ground and said it’s ridiculous. So we compromised and now we own a Tricerataco holder.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Couple

customer_reviews.title: LICKETY SPLIT!
customer_reviews.text: FAST DELIVERY AND MY GRANDSON GOT THIS FOR HIS BDAY FROM ME AND HAPPENED TO HAVE THIS SHIRT I BOUGHT HIM FOR SCHOOL SO MY DAUGHTER SENT ME THIS PICTURE TO SHOW HE HAD TO WEAR THE SHIRT ALONG WITH HIS TACO HOLDERS. LOL A HAPPY KID MAKES A HAPPY MOTHER AND TEXT MESSAGES TO GRANDMA MAKES ME HAPPY THAT THEY ARE HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Pamcakes81

customer_reviews.title: Making Tacos Delicious for 65 Million Years
customer_reviews.text: Did I think our household needed a triceratops taco holder? Nope. Was I wrong? Yes. So very, very wrong. Pros: Adds a bit of whimsy to taco night; is not life-sized and therefore fits inside your average house. Cons: Only holds two delicious tacos.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Just order it already!
customer_reviews.text: Do you love tacos? Do you love dinosaurs? If you answered yes to either of these questions then you NEED this in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Smooth, high quality
customer_reviews.text: His feet sit level ( unlike other items of this sort). Although perfect for tacos, keys, bill envelopes, and wraparound sunglasses have all been held by this fellow. I have mini dinos that I got from a vending machine that world work well as a display, but Tricerataco has been too busy to just hang out and look good. One hard worker!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Clark

customer_reviews.title: Cute Taco Holder
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what inside of me saw this and thought "I must buy this" but alas, I purchased it as a gift for my brother who is interested in triceratops and dinosaurs. I think it is really cute and I love that it can hold two tacos. It looks just like the product image. It feels slightly cheap for the price I paid, but it makes me smile, so I still like it overall.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: I so badly wanted this to be amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Prime day super excited. I make tacos at home a lot but I hate how they constantly fall over when I'm done making them onto the plate so I needed something to hold my tacos well too bad this isn't it. The slits on the top really designed to hold tacos more like sandwiches. They're squared off at the end so about 30% of your taco actually hangs off of the back of the dinosaur and with the tacos being a loose fit inside of it as well means that they're more likely to fall off onto the plate or the floor then they are to end up in your mouth. LOL :-(
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as pictured. Family got a good laugh, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Scher

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaur taco holder
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered one since I wasn't quite sure how durable it was and if it would be large enough to actually hold a taco for the kids. I was delighted when it arrived (which was in good timing). It is quite sturdy and the two taco holding areas are big enough for a larger or regular size taco.
customer_reviews.author: Helen from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Too bad, since my son absolutely loves dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea, but way too small for a real taco. Too bad, since my son absolutely loves dinosaurs. Would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Dino-Tastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as the “white elephant gift” for my office party and a fist fight nearly broke out over who got to take this bad boy home. It. Was. Awesome! Do yourself a favor and buy like 40 of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Dino DELIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: BEST impulse buy EVER EVER EVER!!! WOW, these lil' guys are fun and functional too. Hold them tacos up for filling/gobbling and, of course, refilling YUM! We bought the whole set (my husband has named them :). Highly recommend to add some fun into taco Tuesdays and get the whole set like we did for even more joyous dining. These critters will be holiday gifts for all of our family this year for sure.
customer_reviews.author: K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Too big. Hard to store. Well isn’t deep enough. I wish I didn’t buy them
customer_reviews.author: Crystell

customer_reviews.title: Fun novelty product to look at but not functional
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a fun idea, but the compartments that are meant to hold a taco are not big enough. Two different brand of taco shells did not fit. They were too wide to fit in the narrow slots so pretty much made this useless and is just an odd dinosaur figure. Maybe others are able to get shells that fit but I'm not going to hunt down and try every brand of hardshell tacos to use this thing. its a fun idea, but it isn't actually functional.
customer_reviews.author: khaleesi

customer_reviews.title: unnecessary but fun
customer_reviews.text: Unnecessary but fun. Great for a picky kid if it gets them to eat. It takes up a lot of room. Both of my kids have one. Half the time they remember to use them, and half the time they remain in the dino graveyard (lower cabinet).
customer_reviews.author: Suggie

customer_reviews.title: Taking Taco Tuesday to the next level!
customer_reviews.text: We are always looking for ways to make food fun! Our 6-year-old dinosaur lover is having a blast with his new Nachosaurus. The "stegosaurus" holds a good amount of chips, and we are loving the separated bowl for two different dips. Super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Larcom

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Grandkids loved them and ate their tacos! Highly enjoyed their excitement and recommend these! I even used one!
customer_reviews.author: JayLoK

customer_reviews.title: He FaceTimed me tonight to share with me his joy at using the tricerataco for the first time
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my 27 year old son because he is a taco connoisseur. He FaceTimed me tonight to share with me his joy at using the tricerataco for the first time. We were so disappointed to discover that the tricerataco is so small it doesn’t even fit his preferred hard shell...Ortega. It’s apparent the tricerataco is designed for a mini hard shell or quite possibly to hold taquitos. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUNCTIONAL AND FUN
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVED them! They hold the tacos nicely and the fillings don't fall out. When we were opening gifts at Christmas, the adults all expressed that they would have like them for themselves! Very sturdy and stands up in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: nancy the navigator

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: These taco holders are super cute!. This made stuffing the tacos ten times easier, and you don't have to worry about all of the ingredients falling out when you lay the taco back down. It also keeps the taco standing after you have bit into it. They are super and fun, and very easier to clean. These work for soft tacos too, but soft tacos will still flop over slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: Every night can be a party
customer_reviews.text: Umm yes please? Our kids have been going through a taco obsessed phase(we aren’t complaining) and this was a gift for my son. My husband and I use it more than the kids, because let’s be honest, this thing friggin rules.
customer_reviews.author: ThatHollandLady

customer_reviews.title: Dino lovers delight!
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift for the Dino enthusiast!! These are pretty durable and fun to use! Only complaint is they can take up a good chunk of cabinet space so would be nice to have a more collapsible design maybe? Overall a great product for the price and would recommend these for your Dino lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Kips

customer_reviews.title: Taco triceratops!
customer_reviews.text: Taco triceratops is the BEST! I love it soO much! My daughter loves dinosaurs & there is nothing more she loves to eat than tacos so I had to get this for her! She loves it & it really does hold her tacos. Taco night just got turned up a notch!
customer_reviews.author: Rx.Queen

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and cute! Only issue is it's too small to fit taco shells. It might be the kind we had,but they didn't fit and kinda balanced on top. Still cool though.
customer_reviews.author: Slim Shady

customer_reviews.title: Silly Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gag gift for Christmas. We do a gift exchange with siblings every year and this always finds it way back into the gift exchange. It is very durable and looks brand new every year. It hasn't been used yet (I don't think) so cannot really rate how sturdy it is or if it is easy to clean. It is very nice though!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nacho Average Chip Bowl
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This really gets the job done. I am beyond pleased with how easy it is to reach for more chips because it's just so fun. 10/10 would make you friends at a party. A bit of a choking hazard because I can't help but chuckle when grabbing a chip from this Dino-myte product. There is nothing prehistoric about it. This is the future.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: RAWR
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for taco tuesday. My kids loved this- but I feel like this is a great gift for all ages. Fits 2 standard size taco shells. Also good with grilled cheese and waffles + more. Definitly recommended
customer_reviews.author: DDBoBo

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a white elephant gift. Didn’t even open it but when the recipient opened it it was broken. Now have to go through the hassle of returning it ugh. Would have been perfect if it wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: Lbatch

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly when loaded with food and placed on a food tray.
customer_reviews.text: Best to already be seated with your food before you load it up. It is very difficult to clean thoroughly, especially if the food is greasy, and it seems a bit fragile; but I do not plan on doing pressure endurance test on it, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive taco holder but it's a dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously cute and funny. Gave with a tacosaurus shirt for a themed gift. I wish it wasn't so expensive, but it was worth the laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Friend loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend who loves Dino items. We actually were having a taco party for his birthday so it seemed only fitting. Everyone kept asking where I got it and thought it was so cute. Its made of plastic and its fairly sturdy hey it held the tacos that all that really matters.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson. He is 4. Honestly the rest of us want one too. Fun way to present food. Tacos, PB&J, pancakes ect. We laughed & laughed when he opened. We are going to add to "herd" with other dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: every night is Taco night now
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He has leftovers just to use it again. Makes Tacos for dinner so much more fun and easy as I can fill it up and it doesn't tip over. I never put 2 in at a time because I don't want the 2nd taco getting cold but 2 slots was all I can find. But that didn't matter - this was the best money I have spent in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun to use, not very big to use for many people but we put it out for a party along with bigger bowls of chips and salsa. Conversation piece and super cute! Only downside is that the separater doesn’t seem to work the best because it’s too short and spills into one another, but that doesn’t bother me because we use it for just one type of salsa.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth D.

customer_reviews.title: TriceraTacos are a big hit!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our friend turned 70. He said no gifts for his week long party. One night we served tacos and served his on two of these TriceraTaco holders. He loved them and so did everyone else at the party.
customer_reviews.author: PDR Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to try this myself, because it was a gift for my nephew. He’s loved it so much! And my sister said it was super easy to clean and worked perfectly! They are still using it and it was a Christmas present, so it’s obviously durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reihing

customer_reviews.title: Cute cute cute
customer_reviews.text: Charming- afraid to put tacos in them, using for napkin holder right now, don't want to wreck them. They now have other dinos too...really cute, my brother is 60 and loves dinos and this was a Christmas gift and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Braden

customer_reviews.title: Asteroid Proof?
customer_reviews.text: As New Earth Christian's, my wife and I have taught our children that Dinosaurs roamed the earth with humans, as it is written in our Bible. This makes our veggie taco Tuesdays so much more fun! They aren't scary, so they won't give little Willowmoon PTSD. Very good!
customer_reviews.author: Past Master 2014

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift and it was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this and the Nachosaurus as a gift and they were perfect for the nacho/taco enthusiast. When he shared his on Facebook friends commented about wanting them or even already owning them. Fun for a kid or an adult. Who says you can't have fun at dinner?!
customer_reviews.author: Indy Snow

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for pieces of plastic melded together.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Quality Product, but just plastic pieces melded together. It should be priced at $8. But, it is a funny gift for my 43 year old brother who loves tacos and dressed as a blow up T-Rex for Halloween.”
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Creative way to get my son to eat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, hes 3 and actually asked me for it after he saw me looking on Amazon. He gets his sandwich cut in half served in it and it actually gets him to eat! It's very cute and fairly durable if your not snacking it around.
customer_reviews.author: cStrein

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t actually hold taco shells. The taco holder spots are way too narrow and the shells kept breaking. Bummer. My son was so excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: SO fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE these so much! They are wanting tacos every night! My only complaint would be the slots are a little narrow for more taco shells to be able to safely fit 2 tacos in (you can't get it all the way in the bottom, so it might fall out - be careful!) but seriously, it's minor! The kids love it, and it makes dinner time a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jen T

customer_reviews.title: ... first and only question is how could you not love this?
customer_reviews.text: My first and only question is how could you not love this?! Holds 2 standard size hard taco shells or the street taco soft shells, and is a super easy way to make a picky kid enjoy taco time!
customer_reviews.author: Bontastik

customer_reviews.title: Good gift excellent outcome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a stocking gift for my wife. She loved it since was funny enough for a "small" present. It looks exactly like in the picture, however it feels slightly bigger. It's easy to clean and very functional & fun. I look forward to get the other models.
customer_reviews.author: Jagoba

customer_reviews.title: Decorative, fun, strong plastics. Meets expectations completely
customer_reviews.text: The TriceraTaco is a fun thing to keep, and extremely decorative. I love mine and in fact gave it a name. Functionally it serves little purpose as it does not provide much space, it holds the tacos well but if you're like me then toppings fall out of your tacos, and this doesn't provide much of a catching room for it. Pros: Strong plastics Perfect serving size (2 tacos) Decorative Definitely met expectations Cons: Functionality Ability to hold toppings is poor (Reason for only four stars)
customer_reviews.author: David Dean Penland

customer_reviews.title: Hard plastic, cheap look and feel but I guess ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard plastic, cheap look and feel but I guess to a child it's ok. The balance is off when you put a taco in it.
customer_reviews.author: David Blagborne

customer_reviews.title: Very small and its plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was not expected this material, and the product came too late which was an other reason. Very disappointed, but its good as a game but I will not use and put my tacos inside. Just a personal opinion
customer_reviews.author: hind

customer_reviews.title: Nachosaurus is Rawr-some!!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and actually functional. I will be using way more than I thought. Super cute and so much fun! Can't wait until I need chips and dip again or just in the workroom 😀
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My kids love the tricerataco
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the tricerataco. It solves the always challenging problem of stuffing your taco and having it sit up straight so the contents don't fall out. And you get to eat out of a dinosaur.
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but small. Really only big enough to hold 1-2 servings of chips. Little pricey for the size but worked out fine for son’s dinosaur themed party.
customer_reviews.author: tjmama

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea. Son likes it. Isn’t as mess free as I had anticipated. Also cleaning in the nooks and crannies is less than desirable. Overall pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a white elephant gift for a work party. People were fighting over it. Will purchase again next Christmas lol.
customer_reviews.author: MishMade

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our grandson for Christmas. He is dinosaur obsessed and is going to go crazy over this! It is soooooo cute! Very sturdy and good size. Could even hold a hot dog in a bun. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Childers

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical for larger homemade tacos.
customer_reviews.text: You can only fit two small tacos on the Dino holder. It was a cute gift, but they don’t get much use.
customer_reviews.author: N. Abdallah

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaur crushes Tacos.
customer_reviews.text: Taco shells dont actually fit in this without breaking. Seems kind if important.
customer_reviews.author: Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to give away as a white elephant gift at the office Christmas potluck. Some people were not really amused but others loved this idea. Fun gift for someone with younger kids!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Tacosaurus Rex is the bomb.com!
customer_reviews.text: This thing isn’t high on detail, but it is clearly a dinosaur with tacos on his back, and my grandson loves it! Anything that helps mealtime be a little more fun is a good thing in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky11

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to open this up. The first thing I did was try to toss in two taco shells like advertised. They did not come even close to fitting. I went to the store the next day and tried to buy a smaller size taco shell and they did not exist. So..... kinda bummed about this one
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for regular size shells
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves it and it made our family taco night a lot more fun. It’s perfect size for regular taco shells but just a bit too small for wider ones.
customer_reviews.author: LaGa

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this was dishwasher safe but I bought this for a white elephant garage sale game and it was a huge hit
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Get this!!! You won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: My kid and husband love this!!! My 5year old wants tacos a lot more often now, and he doesn’t act like it’s such a chore to eat dinner now. Fun, durable, easy to clean and works exactly like we wanted. Now we want the other dinosaurs so that everyone can have one at dinner!!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sturdy and kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Purchased for my Grandsons and they love them! They are sturdy, fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Newman

customer_reviews.title: White Elephant Gift
customer_reviews.text: I am known at work for loving tacos. I got this for my company’s white elephant Christmas party. This was a super funny gift and the recipient thought it was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun taco night!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift. Haven't used, but it looked good and was sturdy! More than I expected. Fun for dinner!
customer_reviews.author: 8949SD

customer_reviews.title: Fun novelty
customer_reviews.text: This taco holder was a gag gift but my family fight over who gets to use it Not sure if it’s dishwasher safe. It’s awkward to store in the cupboard. But fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Yasneski

customer_reviews.title: this is a follow up to my other taco holder
customer_reviews.text: This was a taco holder for the kids. it's amazing how much more interesting the kids are in eating when they can have a bit of fun while doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B.

customer_reviews.title: Novel way to serve tacos!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is into dinosaurs. This was the perfect gift to make dinner time a little fun!
customer_reviews.author: Beaches

customer_reviews.title: Taco Tuesday
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the kids on Taco Tuesday, kids love it. Getting the whole set a must!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Multi Use (Snack Holder)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 8 yr old nephew. He isn't a taco eater, but uses it for all of his snacks. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: KBailey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: A standard crunchy taco shell will not fit in these.
customer_reviews.author: lilyprow

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, not functional
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a one for being a cute design. This product is non functional. Every hard taco shell brand we tried to place in it broke. Waste of money is now sitting atop our fridge
customer_reviews.author: Megan James

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a friend. She got a kick out of it. Each one holds 2 tacos.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for white elephant gift exchange. Everyone loved it! My boss took it him and her 9year old daughter loved it! So fun I will be getting more!
customer_reviews.author: Beth V

customer_reviews.title: Rawr
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for a 5 year old boy. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: JeAnna

customer_reviews.title: It's freaking amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I'll never eat a taco without my TriceraTaco ever again. It's freaking amazing!
customer_reviews.author: J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Funny gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a white elephant gift. Needless to say it was stolen twice and was a hit! Thinking about getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent it to my 31-year-old nephews.
customer_reviews.text: Sent it to my 31-year-old nephews. They are children at heart and they got a kick out of receiving these taco holders
customer_reviews.author: gayle

customer_reviews.title: He is so cute
customer_reviews.text: He is so cute - I got 2 for cinco de mayo and instagramed him 1000000 times. Is it kind of useless? Yes. Do I care? No. I will find other uses for him.....
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my sister as a Christmas gift and they were such a hit! I saw them in a few stores but as always, Amazon had the best pricing!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hoeffel

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Eve tacos!!!
customer_reviews.text: We decided to have tacos for our Christmas Eve dinner so I bought these exactly for that purpose. They are awesome! The whole family loved them....now the get that nacho bowl...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a bit pricey for the size.
customer_reviews.text: I knew the dimentions before buying I just think it’s a bit small for the price. Only holds a small handful of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for white elephant, dirty santa, whatever you call it...
customer_reviews.author: lara

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift for Kids
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved them. They played in the tub with them, in the sand with them, and ate with them!!! A real hit for dinosaur loving kids !
customer_reviews.author: Mavis

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but seemed a bit pricey for what it is, The other taco holders are selling at least two for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: So cute for my dinosaur expert! It is the ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute for my dinosaur expert! It is the right size for traditional sized tacos. I was worried it might be a bit small. Maybe he’ll even eat a veggie or two on his tacos!!!
customer_reviews.author: gagaoriginal

customer_reviews.title: Cute display
customer_reviews.text: So cute would love to get 4-5 more so everyone could have one.
customer_reviews.author: brittney clark

customer_reviews.title: Small dish for chips
customer_reviews.text: We are huge “Chip & Salsa” eaters and absolutely love the dinosaur holder for the fact that it’s really just fun for the kids and company...but the *dip dish* is hard to use with any kind of chip because it’s not very big or deep, and the line in the middle makes the spots much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wright

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfectly unique gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for our 4 year old grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Sherwoods

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. Definitely don't plan on using this for a crowd. Over all my kids love it but I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 crazy boys

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea, poor product quality
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold very much other than a flat bottom hard taco shell. Cheap lightweight plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Burmaster

customer_reviews.title: My favorite dinosaur holder
customer_reviews.text: This dinosaur shape is more durable and heavier plastic than the other dinosaur shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Cioffi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Looks exactly like its pictured
customer_reviews.text: super cute!!! My dinosaur love it and loves tacos even more now!
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters favorite thing. Is it a necessity, no. Is it awesome, yes!
customer_reviews.author: kcichorz

customer_reviews.title: Triceratops Tacos good so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who is just a child in disguise. He loves it and thought it was hilarious. Plastic seems to be pretty durable though we haven’t tested it out on our kids yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece for Christmas, she has found a new Barbie companion! Works great as a taco holder, but pulls double duty as a Barbie “horse”
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!

product_meta.title: Funwares TriceraTaco Ultimate Dinosaur Stand, Holds 2, Top Rated Novelty Taco Holder
product_meta.description: Style Name:TriceraTACOTricerataco taco holderkids love Dinosaurs, and kids love Tacos! Spark their imagination and combine the 2 with meal-time adventure! bpa-free plastic Dino holds 2 tacos for neater serving and eating. 10" Long.
feature_bullets: KIDS AND ADULTS: The ultimate taco stand for children, teens, and dino lovers of all ages brings a roaring good time to taco night or any meal or snack time.

LITTLE KIDS LOVE TACO TUESDAYS: If your children are picky eaters, take the stress out of mealtime with a fun dish for kids! This dino also holds crackers, waffles, sandwiches, nachos, panini sandwiches, pizza roll-ups, burrito dogs, cheese flautas, and other snacks.
CONVENIENT TACO SERVING TRAY: Every taco lover will adore this fun kitchen gadget, and you can also use for dinosaur themed birthday parties, Taco Tuesday Nights, or just to bring fun to meals.
COMPLETELY FOOD SAFE: All KidsFunwares are made with safe materials that are 100% Food-Safe & BPA-Free. We test all of our KidsFunwares to ensure they meet or exceed current safety standards.
GREAT GIFT: Perfect for kids and adults that are looking to add a bit of fun to the dinner table!
